long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Removes video ads from Youtube, Immersive experience with youtube videos.


Features:
 * Please refresh the homepage of YouTube for the first time
 - Click on the YouTube video link to automatically open the player page, remove video ads, immersive video experience
 - The background color of the player changes with the YouTube homepage


 Our method of blocking ads is unique and unlike other chrome plug-ins, we hope to bring you an immersive viewing experience
